# CBD COP16/31 Notes

## Source

- Convention on Biological Diversity COP16 Decision 16/31 (Monitoring framework)
- https://www.cbd.int/decisions/cop/?m=cop-16

## Key Requirements Extracted

- Maintain headline indicator and binary indicator coverage under GBF monitoring.
- Preserve indicator metadata lineage and methods clarity.
- Support structured national reporting with auditable data provenance.

## NBMS Mapping

- GBF headline/binary registry seeding retained and expanded.
- Spatial registry now supports map-based indicator evidence and disaggregation.
- OGC-style feature/tile APIs provide standards-aligned publication surfaces for spatial evidence.
